client.model

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Facade class which statically manages the client's games and updates the model based on the results from the server

      • processGame

        public static void processGame(java.lang.String json)
        Updates or creates a game on the client from the provided JSON
        Parameters:
        json - JSON containing the Game model to update to
        Pre-Condition:
        a valid json object is given as reflected in the documentation
        Post-Condition
        the game is updated or added if it did not previously exist

      • userCanJoinGame

        public static boolean userCanJoinGame(int gameIndex,
                      User user)
        Parameters:
        gameIndex - the index of the game to join
        user - the user of inquiry
        Returns:
        whether or not the user can join the specified game
        Pre-Condition:
        a game exists at gameIndex

      • getActiveGame

        public static Game getActiveGame()
        Returns:
        The model of the game active on the client, or null if no game is active
